quest.name: Shocking Discoveries
journal: Marcette would put you to work again, whether you like it or not.

The genius naturalist Marcette has deigned to appoint you to the most honorable position of Research Assistant Six, and promptly ordered you to procure a live lightning spark for her research. Weaken the creature and capture it in the receptacle she has provided for you.
You have captured a live lightning spark. Despite your concerns for the creature's fate, you have agreed to deliver it to Marcette.
Marcette is on the verge of another pioneering discovery. Despite your continued contributions to her research, she has yet to remember your number, let alone your name.
objectives: Use the thick glass jar on a weakened lightning spark.
Deliver the live lightning spark to Marcette.

dialogue.name: MARCETTE
dialogue.text: Research Assistant Six. Yes, I am speaking to you, Research Assistant Six─that is the title I have deigned to bestow upon you after your humble contribution to my latest scientific breakthrough.

dialogue.name: MARCETTE
dialogue.text: Mind you, now that you are officially my slave─er, research assistant─there will be no slacking off. I require a live lightning spark. Here is a jar. Now hurry─I haven't all day!

dialogue.name: MARCETTE
dialogue.text: The mere fact that you dare to interrupt me means that you must have the live lightning spark I require. Well, hand it over, then!

dialogue.name: MARCETTE
dialogue.text: Oooh, aren't you a cute little one!? Just think of all the fun I can have with you! The next assistant who dares shirk herhis duties is in for quite a shock! Muahahaha!!!

dialogue.name: MARCETTE
dialogue.text: Now, where was I? Ah, yes, toadstools! If my theories are correct, sending a shock through the toadstools will trigger a sense of danger, causing them to reproduce with unheard-of speed!

dialogue.name: MARCETTE
dialogue.text: Truly, my genius knows no bounds! To think of the discoveries I could make if I had but a single competent assistant! ...You! Assistant Seven! Or was it Four!? Oh, whoever you are, begone from my sight and let me concentrate for once!
